content.desc: Prince William and Prince Harry’s fashion has been dubbed as terrible and disgusting by fashion experts. Does he ever wear anything smart? Any suits? Is there any Ozwald Boateng or some tailoring? No. What does William wear? Disgusting grey suits. These boys have the luxury of any designer on earth wanting to dress them and they always look completely terrible,” she said. Neil Sean, a ...

content.title: Princes Harry, William’s ‘Rift’ Linked To Princess Diana - International Business Times
content.desc: Prince Harry and Prince William’s alleged rift reportedly has links to their late mom Princess Diana. The Sun’s royal correspondent Emily Andrews spoke to a palace courtier about the royal siblings’ falling out and was told that Prince Harry went mental after his older brother tried to wreck his relationship with Meghan Markle. “As one royal courtier told me: ‘It’s my opinion that Harry feels he couldn’t protect his mother, so he’s going all out to protect his wife. This is his way of atoning. He will book absolutely no criticism of Meghan – and he is so sensitive he often sees criticism or...

content.title: Prince George Is Princess Diana’s ‘Reincarnation,’ Psychic Claims - International Business Times
content.desc: Prince George is claimed to be Princess Diana’s reincarnation by psychic Sharon Prasad. In the Netflix documentary “The Royals,” the expert said that Prince George’s July 22 birthday makes him Cancer. He shares the same zodiac sign with his late grandmother. “If we have to look at the Cancer influence with Lady Diana this is really interesting because it shows a life-death connection. It resonates a lot of karma. What that actually means is that he’s the reincarnation of Lady Diana,” Prasad said. According to Vedic astrology, an ancient Indian practice, a person’s birth chart can show how t...

content.title: Prince William Previously ‘Shunned’ Idea Of Marrying Kate Middleton - International Business Times
content.desc: Prince William previously shunned Kate Middleton and the idea of marrying her – or anyone – during one of his interviews. In the book “The Making of a Royal Romance” by Katie Nicholl, it was revealed that the future King once denied any suggestion that he would wed Middleton anytime soon. When he was just 22 years old, he was asked about settling down, and he said, “Look, I’m only 22 for God’s sake. I’m too young to marry at my age. I don’t want to get married until I am at least 28 or maybe 30.” Prince William also thought that Prince Harry would tie the knot before him, but this didn’t ha...

content.title: Prince Charles Accused Princess Diana Of ‘Showing Off’ At A Party - International Business Times
content.desc: Prince Charles previously accused Princess Diana of showing off over a Christmas present-gone-wrong-incident many years ago. In the documentary “Princess Diana: The Woman Inside,” it was revealed how Princess Diana would often visit the rehearsals of the ballet companies in London when she was still alive. The late Princess of Wales also took part in daily classes at the English National Ballet in Kensington. Princess Diana was reportedly so excited to share what she learned in class to Prince Charles and wanted her performance to be her Christmas present for her husband. But the dad of two...

content.title: Meghan Markle And Prince Harry’s Rumored Baby Name Picks - International Business Times
content.desc: Meghan Markle and Prince Harry have yet to reveal whether they are having a boy or a girl (or twins, if rumors are to be believed), but they are said to have nailed down potential baby names if their child turns out to be a boy. While the Duke and Duchess of Sussex have yet to settle on one name, Life & Style Magazine reports they have narrowed it down to two royal monikers. “The top contenders are Charles, after Harry’s father, and Arthur,” shared a source. “But nothing’s definite yet.” Arthur was thought to be a strong contender for Prince William and Kate Middleton’s third child ahead of...

content.title: Prince Andrew Called ‘Lazy, Selfish’ By Prince Philip For This Reason - International Business Times
content.desc: Prince Andrew left Prince Philip irritated many years ago for being “lazy and selfish.” In the book “Prince Andrew: The War Hero from Buckingham Palace,” author Jessica Jayne said that even though Prince Andrew inherited his dad’s charm and looks, his playboy image badly hurt the royal family. “His early life as a playboy image was hurting the image of the royal family, further worsened by the fact that the prince didn’t perform engagements as much as his family wanted him to,” Jayne said. During the last week that Prince Andrew stayed with Queen Elizabeth II and Prince Philip at Holyroodho...

content.title: Did Meghan Markle, Kate Middleton Make ‘Powerful Women’ List? - International Business Times
content.desc: Forbes’ annual “World’s 100 Most Powerful Women” list was released earlier this week, but you might be surprised to learn that neither Meghan Markle nor Kate Middleton made the cut. Despite how much attention the two garner from the public on a daily basis, and despite all of the events they attend and the charitable initiatives they’re always working on, Markle and the Duchess of Cambridge’s names are not on the list. They do have a royal relative who made it, though. Out of the 100 women on the listing, Queen Elizabeth II ranks among the top 25 most powerful women of the world. She comes ...

content.desc: Photo Illustration by The Daily Beast This week began with another set of challenging headlines for the young royals, as the internet continued to feed on the most compelling royal story in years; reports of a rift at the heart of the royal family, with a feud developing between the Duke and Duchess of Cambridge (William and Kate) and the Duke and Duchess of Sussex (Harry and Meghan). However, midweek, a concerted fightback began, with what appeared to be a deliberate leak from Kensington Palace that not only will both families be at Sandringham, the queen’s estate in Norfolk, for Christmas...

content.desc: Prince Charles and Princess Diana’s divorce raised the idea for Prince William to be king and leapfrog his father. Royal experts Kaitlin Menza and Lisa Ryan discussed Prince Charles’ role as Queen Elizabeth II’s successor on the podcast “Royally Obsessed.” The experts talked about a 1992 book that was written the wake of Prince Charles and Princess Diana’s divorce. “The announcement of Charles and Diana’s divorce caused new speculation about whether Charles will ever become King. His mother, at 66, is in robust health and has made it clear that she considers being a Queen a job for life,” t...

content.title: Prince Harry Dubbed ‘Funniest Royal’ After Making Jokes - International Business Times
content.desc: Prince Harry has been dubbed as the funniest royal after he uttered a slew of jokes at musical that he attended by himself. The Duke of Sussex watched “Bat Out of Hell,” which benefitted his charity, the Invictus Foundation. While there, he got up on stage to introduce the show and made everyone laugh. “I’m sure you’re all desperate for the show to start. So, just that. I really want to come on stage and say an enormous thank you to ‘Bat Out of Hell’ for putting tonight on and to all of you for buying tickets and for any of you that didn’t know that this was for the Invictus Foundation, you...

content.title: Prince William’s First Project As King Will Be For Princess Diana - International Business Times
content.desc: Prince William will restore Princess Diana’s title. The late Princess of Wales’ royal butler Paul Burrell believes that when the Duke of Cambridge takes over the throne, his first project will focus on restoring his late mother’s royal title. Princess Diana was stripped of her title following her divorce from Prince Charles. “One day when William is king, the first thing he’ll do is restore his mother’s titles,” Burrell said in the 2017 Amazon Prime documentary “The Diana Story.” Princess Diana was given a royal title when she married Prince Charles in 1981. However, when her divorce was fi...

content.title: This Female Royal Is More Rebellious Than Prince Harry - International Business Times
content.desc: Prince Harry is not the most rebellious member of the royal family. In the 2013 Netflix documentary “The Royals,” author Philip Dampier said the Duke of Sussex’s cousin, Zara Phillips, made a scandalous act that drew a lot of attention. Dampier referenced an incident when Philips showed her pierced tongue at Prince Charles’ 50th birthday. Due to the incident, he branded Phillips as “a bit of a royal rebel.” “When she had her tongue stud put in, I think it came on the back of some other publicity she had had prior to that where she had few punch-ups with her then-boyfriend, who was a jockey,...

content.title: How the Duchess of Cambridge revolutionised the humble hairband - The Telegraph
content.desc: Ever since the Duchess of Cambridge stepped up to her Royal duties in 2011 she has flown the flag for lavish hair accessories. From bold hats during state services to traditional ornate fascinators at society weddings, she has always taken a regal approach to Royal dressing and accessories. However since returning from maternity leave this autumn, the Duchess has modernised her once quite formal approach to hair accessories and has brought back traditional styles like the headband and pretty grosgrain ribbons in an elegant, modern way. content.desc: Princess Charlotte has reached a new milestone. On Thursday, Prince William and Kate Middleton’s only daughter experienced her first Nativity play at Willcocks Nursery School. The annual Christmas performance for students was confirmed by a listing on the school’s website. It remains unknown if Princess Charlotte had a role in the play and what it was, but the Duke and Duchess of Cambridge would have been keen to watch it if she did. content.title: Boy so overwhelmed by Queen's visit he immediately crawls out of room - The Independent
content.desc: A little boy was so overwhelmed when meeting the Queen that he dropped to his knees and crawled out of the nearest door. Nine-year-old Nathan Grant was so starstruck upon being introduced to the monarch by his adoptive parents, former Fame Academy judges David and Carrie Grant, that he bolted out of the room, shouting "bye" as he left. Onlookers can be seen laughing in a video captured during the exchange while the Queen visited Coram, the UK's oldest children's charity. content.title: Why Kate Middleton Is Not Called Princess - International Business Times
content.desc: Kate Middleton is known as the Duchess of Cambridge and not as a princess, unlike Princess Diana. Emily Hodgkin, a journalist for Express, said that even though Middleton is not referred to as Princess Kate or Princess Catherine, this title appears on Prince Louis’ birth certificate. On the legal document, she is registered as a Princess of the United Kingdom. However, the mom of three of officially referred to as Her Royal Highness, the Duchess of Cambridge.” Since she’s married to Prince William, she is also a princess. But when they tied the knot in 2011, he was given a peerage and becam...

content.title: Princess Diana Reportedly Obsessed About Camilla Parker Bowles On Her Wedding Day - International Business Times
content.desc: Princess Diana famously called out the fact that Camilla Parker Bowles was Prince Charles’ mistress during their marriage, but a new report claims that she was so worried about the other woman coming between her and her husband that she obsessively looked for her on her own wedding day. According to Express UK, as Princess Diana walked down the aisle of St. Paul’s Cathedral to wed Prince Charles in 1981, she was on the lookout for Parker Bowles. The website quotes Paul Burrell, Princess Diana’s personal butler, from something he revealed in the 2017 Amazon Prime documentary “The Diana Story...
